helpItems.name: Create new Unit
helpItems.description: Click here to create a new unit

helpItems.name: Delete Unit
helpItems.description: Click here to delete the unit

helpItems.name: Edit Unit
helpItems.description: Click here to edit the unit

helpItems.name: Save Unit
helpItems.description: Click here to save the unit

helpItems.name: Name
helpItems.description:
Name of the unit.
  • Has to be unique.

helpItems.name: Description
helpItems.description:
Description of the unit.
  • a short overview how the unit should be used.

helpItems.name: Abbreviation
helpItems.description:
Abbreviation of the unit.
  • eg., m for meter, Kg for kg etc.

helpItems.name: Data Types
helpItems.description:
Type of the values
  • eg. number, text, boolean etc.

helpItems.name: Measurement System
helpItems.description:
Is the system where the unit belongs to
  • eg. Metric, Nautical etc.
